column1: Full test suite run on LinuxCluster 03.09.2020 + 04.09.2020:
The data are obtained from four different runs of the test suite and should give approximate values.
Total Testsuite   6:36 h  6:40 h  6:30 h 19:37 h
Note: The storage varies and can be larger or smaller depending on the block size of the file system
and does not reflect the actual file size
column2: but the size occupied on the disk. This is

column1: problematic especially for the 1D cases that are below the block size. The given values are only
Total Testsuite  11.4 GB  4.0 GB 15.5 GB 30.9 GB
